data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
Atalanta's Duvan Zapata has run offside.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Free kick for Lecce in the half of Atalanta.
Goal kick for Atalanta at Via del Mare.
Atalanta push forward at Via del Mare and Duvan Zapata gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lecce defence.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Lecce have a goal kick.
Free kick Lecce.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In Lecce a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In Lecce, Jose Luis Palomino of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Lecce awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a Lecce throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Free kick Atalanta.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
Atalanta's Duvan Zapata gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lecce defender.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Giulio Donati has the misfortune to make it 0-1 through an own goal.
Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lecce's half?
Josip Ilicic for Atalanta drives towards goal at Via del Mare. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Duvan Zapata heads in to give Atalanta a 0-2 lead at Via del Mare.
Josip Ilicic with an assist there.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Lecce.
Corner awarded to Lecce.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lecce in the half of Atalanta.
Papu Gomez for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lecce goal kick.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Josip Ilicic's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lecce.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In Lecce Atalanta attack through Jose Luis Palomino. The finish is off target, however.
Davide Massa awards Lecce a goal kick.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a strike by Riccardo Saponara. .
Great play from Alessandro Deiola to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Lecce is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Lecce territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Throw-in Lecce.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lecce's half?
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Lecce.
Important block from the Lecce defence as Robin Gosens fires in a strike for Atalanta.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Atalanta are coming forward and Marten De Roon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Lecce goal kick.
Throw-in for Lecce at Via del Mare.
Lecce awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Giulio Donati levels the score at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Riccardo Saponara.
Davide Massa signals a Atalanta throw-in in Lecce's half.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Lecce territory.
Lecce's Antonin Barak gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Davide Massa awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Goal kick for Atalanta at Via del Mare.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Lecce in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
At Via del Mare, Hans Hateboer has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The second-half is underway in Lecce.
Atalanta drives forward and Papu Gomez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Atalanta have got their heads in front thanks to a Josip Ilicic strike.
Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
Atalanta's Mario Pasalic breaks free at Via del Mare. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lecce.
In Lecce Atalanta attack through Josip Ilicic. The finish is off target, however.
Lecce have a goal kick.
Goal! Duvan Zapata extends Atalanta's lead to 2-4.
Mario Pasalic instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Atalanta's Robin Gosens gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lecce defender.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lecce's half?
Free kick for Lecce in the half of Atalanta.
Jose Luis Palomino (Atalanta) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Atalanta at Via del Mare.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
Great finish from Duvan Zapata to give Atalanta a 2-5 lead.
That's a fine assist from Josip Ilicic.
Fabio Liverani is making the team's first substitution at Via del Mare with Yevhen Shakhov replacing Marco Mancosu.
Panagiotis Tachtsidis is replacing Zan Majer for Lecce at Via del Mare.
Davide Massa signals a Lecce throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Atalanta needs to be cautious. Lecce have an attacking throw-in.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Lucioni is booked for the home team.
Gianluca Lapadula gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lecce.
Throw-in for Lecce in their own half.
Atalanta make their first substitution with Ruslan Malinovskyi replacing Papu Gomez.
Ball safe as Lecce is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Riccardo Saponara (Lecce) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Atalanta.
Josip Ilicic (Atalanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Lecce in their own half.
The away team replace Josip Ilicic with Luis Muriel.
Lecce awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lecce in the half of Atalanta.
Lecce drive upfield and Riccardo Saponara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
Lecce push forward at Via del Mare and Marco Calderoni gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atalanta defence.
In Lecce, Ruslan Malinovskyi of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta's Luis Muriel gets in a shot on goal at Via del Mare. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Lecce territory.
Important block from the Lecce defence as Mario Pasalic fires in a strike for Atalanta.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Lecce in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lecce are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Lecce a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced Duvan Zapata with Adrien Tameze. This is the third substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
Free kick for Lecce in the half of Atalanta.
Panagiotis Tachtsidis for Lecce gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Davide Massa awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Atalanta take a comfortable 2-6 lead thanks to Luis Muriel.
In Lecce a free kick has been awarded the away team.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Lecce.
In Lecce, Riccardo Saponara of Lecce is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Davide Massa blows to end the match. The final score is 2-7.
It's now 2-7 in Lecce as Ruslan Malinovskyi scores for Atalanta.
